++ Cpp Rule Of Three
                                                                               |
C++ (prior to C++11) guideline claiming that if a class defines one (or more) of the following it should probably explicitly define all three:

  * destructor
  * copy constructor
  * copy assignment operator
  
  * because of CppMoveConstructor introduced C++11 and after, becomes CppRuleOfFive
